thread.title: Boardman Nissan prepares customers for the refreshed 2016 Nissan Altima
thread.title_full: Boardman Nissan prepares customers for the refreshed 2016 Nissan Altima

author: admin
title: Boardman Nissan prepares customers for the refreshed 2016 Nissan Altima
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 5:39 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Boardman Nissan 
BOARDMAN, Ohio, Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- One of the most popular vehicles in the Nissan lineup has gotten a stylish refresh for the 2016 model year. The 2016 Nissan Altima has incorporated Nissan's latest design language and added several distinctive exterior features making the Altima more stunning than ever before. For 2016, Nissan has also added a new, performance-inspired SR trim to the selection of Altima vehicles. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151016/277853 
Starting on the outside of the vehicle, the goal of the Nissan designer's redesign was to make this a sedan with a sports car feel. This all starts with the V-Motion Grille at the front of the car which establishes its athletic aesthetic. Along with this is the new boomerang-shaped headlights and low, sculpted bumper, the 2016 Altima has the ability to intimidate even the most ferocious sports cars. 
Customers looking for an even more performance-based edge will find the 2016 Nissan Altima SR trim an enticing offer . The SR has the Xtronic 7-step "manumatic" transmission mated to either the 2.5-liter, 4-cylinder or 3.5-liter V6 engine. It will also have a specially tuned suspension, rear spoiler, paddle shifters and 18-inch aluminum-alloy wheels. 
In addition to the SR trim, there will also be three other models to choose from: S, SV and SL. Each of these has its own selection of features to choose from. Aside from the SR trim, the only other model available with the 3.5-liter V6 engine will be the SL trim. 
Any prospective car-buyers interested in learning more information about the 2016 Nissan Altima should contact a Boardman Nissan sales professional by calling 888-88-6354. The dealership can also be contacted on its website, www.boardmannissan.com . 
Media Contact: Matt Wickwire, Boardman Nissan, 866-879-5141, mwickwire@boardmannissan.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Boardman Nissan
